posts.post_content:
Pretty tough card. Only comp I could find with Polar Bear back was a PSA 3, which went for $7600 on Feebay in August. A Piedmont PSA 1 sold for $2,900 in September. Another Sweet Caporal PSA 1 sold for $3899 in September. Polar Bear a bit tougher, of course. 
Happy to hear offers. 

[IMG][url=https://flic.kr/p/2nX6RXd][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52475735550_6dcfe20f68_k.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2nX6RXd]IMG_7156[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/190525740@N03/]Philip Golden[/url], on Flickr[/IMG]

[IMG][url=https://flic.kr/p/2nX6RVK][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52475735465_40e6de16a1_k.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2nX6RVK]IMG_7157[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/190525740@N03/]Philip Golden[/url], on Flickr[/IMG]
